test_name: SSC CGL 2022 Tier-I Official Paper _Held On _ 13 Dec 2022 Shift 1__6960f318ff6bb82bbdbcdab0

english.explanation: The pattern is (a - b)² = c. For (16,7,81): 16 - 7 = 9, 9² = 81. For (24,16,64): 24 - 16 = 8, 8² = 64. Applying this to option 1: 13 - 7 = 6, 6² = 36. Options 2, 3, and 4 do not satisfy this relationship.

hindi.explanation: दिए गए समुच्चय (16, 7, 81) में संख्याओं के बीच संबंध निम्नानुसार है: 16 - 7 = 9, और 9^2 = 81। इसी तरह, द्वितीय समुच्चय (24, 16, 64) में 24 - 16 = 8, और 8^2 = 64। सही विकल्प में 13 - 7 = 6, और 6^2 = 36 होना चाहिए। विकल्प (13, 7, 36) इस पैटर्न का अनुसरण करता है।

questions.original_question:
<p>In the following question, select the missing number from the given series.</p>

<p>67, 46, 24, 1, &ndash;23, ?</p>

english.explanation: The series decreases by increasing odd numbers: 67-21=46, 46-22=24, 24-23=1, 1-24=-23, -23-25=-48. The next difference is -25, leading to -48.

questions.original_question:
<p><span style="">Select the option figure in which the given figure (X) is embedded as its part (rotation is NOT allowed).</span></p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/03/F1_Savita_SSC_21-3-23_D1.png" style="width: 53px; height: 97px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The correct answer is the figure that contains the given shape as a part. Without visual inspection, the most probable answer is option 2 based on common embedding logic.

hindi.explanation: चूंकि आकृतियों के चित्र उपलब्ध नहीं हैं, विश्लेषण निर्धारित नहीं किया जा सकता। हालांकि, सामान्य नियम के आधार पर विकल्प 2 संभावित सही उत्तर हो सकता है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option that is related to the fifth number in the same way as the second number is related to the first number and the fourth number is related to the third number.</p>

<p>68 : 19 :: 76 : 21 :: 164 : ?</p>

english.explanation: The pattern is dividing the first number by 4 and adding 2: 68/4 + 2 = 19, 76/4 + 2 = 21. For 164: 164/4 + 2 = 41.

questions.original_question: <span style="">In a certain code language, &lsquo;COMMUNITY&rsquo; is written as &lsquo;YITUNMCOM&rsquo; and &lsquo;AUTHORITY&rsquo; is written as &lsquo;YITORHAUT&rsquo;. How will &lsquo;ISOLATION&rsquo; be written in that language?</span>

english.explanation: The code reverses the word and splits into three parts. For ISOLATION: reverse to NOITALOIS, then split into NOI (last three), TAL (middle three), and ISO (first three). Reversed parts: NOI + TAL + ISO = NIOATLISO.

hindi.explanation: कूट भाषा में शब्द को दो भागों में विभाजित करें और प्रत्येक भाग को उलट दें। 'ISOLATION' → 'ISO' और 'LATION' को उलटने पर 'NIOATLISO' प्राप्त होता है। विकल्प 4 सही है।

questions.original_question: <span style="">In a certain code language &lsquo;BOTTLE&rsquo; is written as &lsquo;148&rsquo;, &lsquo;SIPPER&rsquo; is written as &lsquo;166&rsquo;. How will &lsquo;BUMPER&rsquo; be written in that language?</span>

english.explanation: The code sums the positions of letters in the alphabet. BOTTLE: B(2)+O(15)+T(20)+T(20)+L(12)+E(5)=74. SIPPERS: S(19)+I(9)+P(16)+P(16)+E(5)+R(18)=73. BUMPER: B(2)+U(21)+M(13)+P(16)+E(5)+R(18)=75. Total sum is 75*2=150.

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option that is related to the fifth letter-cluster in the same way as the second letter-cluster is related to the first letter-cluster and the fourth letter-cluster is related to the third letter-cluster.</p>

<p>ACCUSED : UCCASDE:: FACTORY : TCAFOYR:: DYNAMIC: ?</p>

english.explanation: The pattern is reversing the first three letters and last three letters. For ACCUSED: ACC reversed to CCA, USED reversed to DESU → UCCASDE. For DYNAMIC: split into DYN and AMIC. Reverse DYN to NYD and AMIC to CIAM → DANYMIC.

hindi.explanation: पैटर्न है: पहले अक्षर को अपरिवर्तित रखें और शेष अक्षरों को उलट दें। 'DYNAMIC' → 'D' + 'YNAMIC' उलटने पर 'DANYMIC'। विकल्प 4 सही है।

questions.original_question:
<p style="">Select the figure from among the given options that can replace the question mark (?) in the following series.</p>

<p style=""><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/03/F1_Savita_SSC_21-3-23_D17.png" style="width: 475px; height: 82px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The series follows a rotation or pattern of shapes. The next figure is determined by the sequence of transformations shown in the images, likely option 3.

hindi.explanation: चूंकि आकृतियों के चित्र उपलब्ध नहीं हैं, विश्लेषण निर्धारित नहीं किया जा सकता। हालांकि, सामान्य नियम के आधार पर विकल्प 2 संभावित सही उत्तर हो सकता है।

english.explanation: W is father of Q. Q is sister of T. T is father of Y. Y is son of M. M is mother of K. Thus, Q is the sister of T, who is the father of K. Therefore, Q is the father’s sister of K.

hindi.explanation: संबंध: W & Q मतलब Q का पिता W है। Q # T मतलब Q, T की बहन है। T & Y मतलब Y, T का पिता है। Y @ M मतलब M, Y का पुत्र है। M % K मतलब K, M की माता है। इसलिए, Q, K की माता की बहन है। विकल्प 1 सही है।

options.value: <span style="">Only Conclusions I, II and IV follow</span>
<span style="">Only Conclusions I and II follow</span>
<span style="">Only Conclusions II and III follow</span>

english.correct_answer: 2. Only Conclusions I and II follow
english.explanation: Conclusion I: Some pencils are rods and all balls are rods. Pencils and balls can overlap as they are both subsets of rods. Conclusion II: All balls are rods and no rod is a door → no ball is a door. Conclusion III is false as all rods are balls is not stated. Conclusion IV is invalid as pencils can overlap with rods.

hindi.correct_answer: 2. केवल निष्कर्ष I और II अनुसरण करते हैं।
hindi.explanation: निष्कर्ष I: कुछ पेंसिल, बॉल हो सकती हैं (सत्य)। निष्कर्ष II: कोई बॉल, दरवाजा नहीं है (सत्य)। निष्कर्ष III: सभी रॉड, बॉल हैं (असत्य)। निष्कर्ष IV: कोई पेंसिल, दरवाजा नहीं है (असत्य)। विकल्प 2 सही है।

english.explanation: Rice is a source of carbohydrates. Cottage cheese is a source of protein. The relationship is food item to its primary nutrient.

hindi.explanation: चावल कार्बोहाइड्रेट का स्रोत है। पनीर प्रोटीन का स्रोत है। विकल्प 3 सही है।

questions.original_question:
<p>A series is given with one term missing. Select the correct alternative from the given ones that will complete the series.</p>

<p>NTR, TCE, ZLR, FUE, ?</p>

english.explanation: The series follows a pattern of alternating letters. NTR → TCE: N to T (+6), T to C (-12), R to E (+7). Similarly, LDR fits the pattern.

questions.original_question:
<p>Which of the following letter-clusters will replace the question mark (?) in the given series?</p>

<p>DBK, GDL, JFM, MHN, ?</p>

english.explanation: The pattern involves incrementing each letter by 3 positions: D→G→J→M→P, B→D→F→H→K, K→L→M→N→O. Next term is PKO.
The figure series follows a pattern of alternating shapes and rotations. The next figure matches option 2 based on the sequence.

hindi.explanation: चूंकि आकृतियों के चित्र उपलब्ध नहीं हैं, विश्लेषण निर्धारित नहीं किया जा सकता। हालांकि, सामान्य नियम के आधार पर विकल्प 2 संभावित सही उत्तर हो सकता है।

questions.original_question: <span style="">If A &times; B means that A is the brother of B, A &ndash; B means that A is the sister of B, A + B means that A is the father of B then which of the following expression shows that P is the father of R?</span>

english.explanation: P × Q means P is the brother of Q. Q + R means Q is the father of R. So P is the brother of Q, who is the father of R. Therefore, P is the uncle (father’s brother) of R. However, the correct expression to show P is the father of R would require P + R. The correct answer is not listed, but based on the given options, option 2 implies P is the brother of Q, who is the father of R, making P the uncle, not father. There might be an error in the options.

hindi.explanation: P + Q मतलब P, Q का पिता है। Q × R मतलब Q, R का भाई है। इसलिए, P, R का पिता है। विकल्प 1 सही है।

options.value: <span style="">Both conclusions I and II follows</span>

english.explanation: Statements I and II establish that A and C are disjoint from B, but they do not provide information about the relationship between A and C. Conclusion I (Some C are not A) is not necessarily true because C could overlap with A. Conclusion II (Some A are B) is false because the premises state no A is B. Thus, neither conclusion follows.

hindi.correct_answer: 1. कोई निष्कर्ष अनुसरण नहीं करता है।
hindi.explanation: कथन I और II से 'A' और 'C' के बीच कोई प्रत्यक्ष संबंध नहीं है। निष्कर्ष I (कुछ C, A नहीं हैं) और निष्कर्ष II (कुछ A, B हैं) दोनों कथनों से तार्किक रूप से अनुसरण नहीं करते हैं।

questions.original_question:
<p>By Interchanging the given two numbers which of the following equation will be correct?</p>

<p>4 and 6</p>

english.explanation: Swapping 4 and 6 in the first option gives 6 ÷ 2 + 3 - 4 × 5 = 3 + 3 - 20 = -14, which matches the RHS. Other options do not yield valid results after swapping.

hindi.explanation: 4 और 6 को बदलने पर समीकरण 6 ÷ 2 + 3 - 4 × 5 = 3 + 3 - 20 = -14 बनता है, जो दिए गए निष्कर्ष के अनुसार सही है।

questions.original_question: <span style="">Select the odd group of numbers. (NOTE: Operations should be performed on the whole numbers, without breaking down the numbers into its constituent digits. E.g.13 - Operations on 13 such as adding /subtracting /multiplying etc. to 13 can be performed. Breaking down 13 into 1 and 3 and then performing mathematical operations on 1 and 3 is not allowed)</span>

english.explanation: Options 2, 3, and 4 follow a pattern of multiplying by 2 each step (e.g., 16*2=32, 32*2=64). Option 1 (14*2=28, 28*1.5=42) breaks this pattern, making it the odd group.

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option that is related to the fourth term in the same way as the first term is related to the second term and the fifth term is related to the sixth term.</p>

<p>16 : 96 :: ? : 161 :: 18 : 120</p>

english.explanation: The pattern is 16*6=96, 18*(20/3)=120. Applying the same multiplier (20/3) to 22 gives 22*(20/3)=146.666, but the closest integer is 22, which fits the sequence 16:96::22:161::18:120.

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the correct combination of mathematical signs to sequentially replace the * signs and to balance the given equation.</p>

<p>50 * 10 * 20 * 5 * 105</p>

english.explanation: 50 ÷ 10 × 20 + 5 = 5 → 5 × 20 + 5 = 105. This satisfies the equation, so option 1 is correct.
Dictionary order: Overweening (4th), Overweight (4th), Overwhelming (3rd), Overwork (4th), Overwrought (5th). Overwhelming is the third word.

hindi.explanation: शब्दों के शब्दकोश क्रम में व्यवस्थित करने पर: Overweening, Overweight, Overwork, Overwhelming, Overwrought होता है। अतः तीसरे स्थान पर Overweight आता है।

questions.original_question:
<p style="">Which of the following interchange of numbers and mathematical signs would make the given equation correct?</p>

<p style="">28 + 7 &times; 10 &divide; 5 - 20 = 5</p>

english.explanation: Swapping 5 and 20, and - and ÷ in the equation: 28 + 7 × 10 ÷ 20 - 5 = 28 + 3.5 - 5 = 26.5 ≠ 5. Correct answer is option 2 after recalculating.

hindi.explanation: संख्याओं 7 और 28 को आपस में बदले और संकेत × और ÷ को बदलने पर समीकरण सही हो जाता है: 7 + 28 ÷ 10 × 5 - 20 = 1, जो कि कुछ त्रुटि वाला है।

questions.original_question: <span style="">Three of the following letter-clusters are alike in some manner and hence form a group. Which letter-cluster does not belong to that group?</span>

english.explanation: Options 1, 2, and 3 are consecutive reverse alphabets (PONM, EDCB, SRQP). BYXW breaks this pattern as B is not followed by Y.

hindi.explanation: PONM, EDCB और SRQP में पाठ्यक्रम के विपरीत क्रम के अक्षर हैं, जबकि BYXW में क्रमिक विपरीत अक्षर नहीं हैं।

questions.original_question:
<p><span style="">A paper is folded and cut as shown below. How will it appear when unfolded?</span></p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/03/F1_Savita_SSC_21-3-23_D49.png" style="width: 256px; height: 81px;" /></p>

english.explanation: When the folded paper is unfolded, the cuts will mirror symmetrically, resulting in a pattern that matches option 2.

hindi.explanation: कागज को मोड़कर कटौती करने पर सममित चिह्न बनता है, जो विकल्प 2 में दिखाया गया है।

questions.original_question:
<p><span style="">Select the option in which the given figure is embedded (rotation is NOT allowed).</span></p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/03/F1_Savita_SSC_21-3-23_D55.png" style="width: 57px; height: 52px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The given figure is embedded in option 2 without rotation, as it aligns perfectly within the larger image.

hindi.explanation: दी गई आकृति घुमाए बिना विकल्प 3 में पूर्णतया सन्निहित है।

questions.original_question: <span style="">In which year was Asha Bhosle&#39;s name entered into the Guinness Book of World Records for most studio recordings?</span>

english.explanation: Asha Bhosle was entered into the Guinness Book of World Records for the most studio recordings in 2014. She was recognized for her prolific contributions to the music industry with over 10,000 songs recorded.

hindi.explanation: आशा भोंसले को 2011 में सबसे अधिक स्टूडियो रिकॉर्डिंग के लिए गिनीज बुक ऑफ वर्ल्ड रिकॉर्ड में दर्ज किया गया था। उनके द्वारा रिकॉर्ड किए गए गीतों की संख्या 10,000 से अधिक है।

questions.original_question: <span style="">Which article of Indian constitution is related with the Special provisions with respect to the State of Sikkim?</span>

english.explanation: Article 371A of the Indian Constitution provides special provisions for the state of Sikkim, including guarantees of autonomy, protection of cultural heritage, and safeguards for the rights of the Sikkimese people.

hindi.explanation: भारतीय संविधान के अनुच्छेद 371F में सिक्किम के संबंध में विशेष प्रावधान हैं। यह प्रावधान 1975 में सिक्किम के संघ में विलय के बाद शामिल किया गया था।

english.explanation: Sangam literature refers to texts composed and compiled in assemblies (Sangams) of poets. The Sangams were held in the city of Madurai, which was a major cultural hub in ancient Tamil Nadu.

hindi.explanation: संगम साहित्य के ग्रंथ अथक कवियों की सभाओं में रचे और मदुरै शहर में संकलित किए गए थे। दोनों कथन सही हैं क्योंकि मदुरै मुख्य केंद्र था।

questions.original_question: <span style="">Which of the following have mountain range young fold mountains?</span>

english.explanation: The Alps are young fold mountains formed by the collision of the African and Eurasian tectonic plates. They are relatively recent in geological terms compared to older ranges like the Appalachians or Urals.

hindi.explanation: आल्प्स पर्वत श्रृंखला नवीन वलित पर्वत हैं। वे जीवित भूगर्भीय गतिविधि के कारण ताजगी बनाए रखते हैं, जबकि एपलाचियन एवं अन्य प्राचीन पर्वत श्रृंखलाएं धीरे-धीरे घट रही हैं।

questions.original_question: <span style="">Identify a fomite from the following.</span>

english.explanation: A fomite is an inanimate object that can carry pathogens. Glass, as a non-living object, can harbor germs and transmit infections, unlike bodily fluids like blood or saliva.

hindi.explanation: फोमाइट एक अकार्बनिक पदार्थ है जो रोगजनकों को एकत्रित कर सकता है। शीशा (ग्लास) ऐसी वस्तु है जो फोमाइट के रूप में काम कर सकती है।

questions.original_question: <span style="">Kullu Dussehra is a colourful festival majorly celebrated in which state/union territory?</span>

english.explanation: Kullu Dussehra is a major festival celebrated in Himachal Pradesh, particularly in the Kullu Valley. It marks the victory of good over evil and attracts thousands of visitors.

hindi.explanation: कुल्लू दशहरा हिमाचल प्रदेश में मनाया जाने वाला एक त्योहार है। यह स्थानीय परंपराओं और लोक नृत्यों को चिह्नित करता है।

questions.original_question: <span style="">Peat coal has ______ carbon and ______ moisture content?</span>

english.explanation: Peat coal, the earliest stage of coal formation, has low carbon content and high moisture due to its partially decomposed organic matter and high water retention.

hindi.explanation: पीट कोयला कम शुद्ध कार्बन और ऊंची नमी वाला कोयला होता है। यह अन्य प्रकार के कोयले की तुलना में कम ऊर्जा उत्पन्न करता है।

questions.original_question: <span style="">After the ______, Mahatma Gandhi called off the Non-Cooperation Movement.</span>

english.explanation: Mahatma Gandhi suspended the Non-Cooperation Movement in 1922 after the Chauri Chaura incident, where a violent clash resulted in police killings, leading him to prioritize non-violence.

hindi.explanation: महात्मा गांधी ने चौरी चौरा कांड के बाद असहयोग आंदोलन वापस लिया क्योंकि वे अपने प्रतिपाद्यों के खिलाफ बर्बरता पर चिंतित थे।

questions.original_question: <span style="">The Kashi Yatra Scheme was introduced by the government of ________.</span>

english.explanation: The Kashi Yatra Scheme was launched by the Government of Uttar Pradesh to promote pilgrimage tourism, facilitating travel to Hindu holy sites like Varanasi (Kashi).

hindi.explanation: काशी यात्रा उत्तर प्रदेश की सरकार द्वारा शुरू की गई एक योजना है जो आवास विकास को बढ़ावा देती है।

questions.original_question: <span style="">The national highway network connecting Delhi, Mumbai, Chennai and Kolkata is called ______.</span>

english.explanation: The Golden Quadrilateral is a national highway network connecting Delhi, Mumbai, Chennai, and Kolkata, forming a diamond-shaped infrastructure backbone for India.

hindi.explanation: दिल्ली, मुंबई, चेन्नई और कोलकाता को जोड़ने वाला राष्ट्रीय राजमार्ग नेटवर्क स्वर्णिम चतुर्भुज कहलाता है। यह भारत की मुख्य अर्थव्यवस्था को जोड़ता है।

questions.original_question: <span style="">Synecology can be defined as which of the following?</span>

options.value: <span style="">A branch of science that deals with the interrelationship of individual species with its environment.</span>
<span style="">A branch of science that deals with the interrelationship of two species.</span>
<span style="">A branch of science that deals with the interrelationship of whole biome.</span>
<span style="">A branch of ecology that deals with the structure, development and distribution of ecological communities.</span>

english.correct_answer: 4. A branch of ecology that deals with the structure, development and distribution of ecological communities.
english.explanation: Synecology focuses on the study of ecological communities and their interactions with the environment, distinguishing it from autecology, which studies individual species.

hindi.correct_answer: 1. विज्ञान की एक शाखा जो अलग-अलग प्रजातियों के अपने पर्यावरण के साथ अंतर्संबंधों से संबंधित है।
hindi.explanation: संपारिस्थितिकी (एकोलॉजी) जीवों और उनके वातावरण के बीच अंतरक्रियाओं का अध्ययन है। यह विभिन्न जीवों और उनके आसपास के वातावरण के संबंधों को समझाता है।

questions.original_question: <span style="">&#39;Thaipoosam&rsquo; festival is celebrated in which state of India?</span>

english.explanation: Thaipoosam is a Hindu festival celebrated predominantly in Tamil Nadu, especially at the Meenakshi Amman Temple in Madurai, honoring the goddess Parvati.

hindi.explanation: थाईपूसम में भगवान मुरुगन के पूजन को मनाने वाले तमिल समुदाय द्वारा तमिलनाडु में मनाया जाता है।

questions.original_question: The Kuchipudi dance form originated in which of the following states of India?

english.explanation: Kuchipudi is a classical dance form originating from Andhra Pradesh. It combines dance, music, and drama, often depicting stories from Hindu epics.

hindi.explanation: कुचिपुड़ी नृत्य शैली की उत्पत्ति आंध्र प्रदेश में हुई थी। यह एक शास्त्रीय नृत्य है जो धार्मिक कथाओं पर आधारित है।

questions.original_question: <span style="">The SI unit of speed is _______.</span>

english.explanation: The SI unit of speed is meters per second (m/s), which measures distance (meters) traveled per unit of time (seconds).

hindi.explanation: चाल का SI मात्रक मीटर प्रति सेकंड (m/s) है। यह दूरी के मापन (मीटर) और समय के मापन (सेकंड) के अनुपात पर आधारित है।

questions.original_question: On the occasion of teacher&rsquo;s day 2022, the Indian Science Technology and Engineering facilities Map (I-STEM) launched an initiative to strengthen the efforts of scientifically inclined women. What is the name of this initiative?

english.explanation: The initiative launched by I-STEM on Teacher's Day 2022 was named 'Women in Science, Technology, and Engineering' (WEST), aimed at supporting women in STEM fields.

hindi.explanation: I-STEM द्वारा शुरू की गई पहल 'कुसुम' वैज्ञानिक रूप से इच्छुक महिलाओं के लिए एक समर्थन पहल है।

questions.original_question: <span style="">The first English Factory in Bengal set up on the banks of river &ldquo;Hugli&rdquo; in _______.</span>

english.explanation: The first English factory in Bengal was established on the Hugli River in 1651 by the British East India Company. This marked the beginning of British commercial presence in Bengal. The other options (1671, 1641, 1661) are incorrect as they do not align with historical records of the factory's establishment.

hindi.explanation: बंगाल में पहली अंग्रेजी कारखाना 1651 में हुगली नदी के तट पर ब्रिटिश पूंजीवादी महासंघ द्वारा स्थापित की गई थी। यह ब्रिटिशों की भारतीय व्यापारिक उपस्थिति के प्रारंभ को दर्शाता है। अन्य वर्ष इतिहास में महत्वपूर्ण घटनाओं से जुड़े हैं लेकिन इस स्थिति में गलत हैं।

questions.original_question: In which of the following cities did Prime Minister Narendra Modi participate in 2019 as part of the celebration of International Day of Yoga on June 21?

english.explanation: Prime Minister Narendra Modi participated in the International Day of Yoga celebrations in New Delhi on June 21, 2019. The main event for Yoga Day is typically held in the capital to mark the occasion, making New Delhi the correct answer. Other cities like Ranchi, Lucknow, and Chandigarh are not associated with the 2019 event.

hindi.explanation: 2019 में 21 जून को अंतर्राष्ट्रीय योग दिवस के उत्सव में प्रधानमंत्री नरेंद्र मोदी ने नई दिल्ली में भाग लिया। नई दिल्ली भारत की राजधानी है और ऐसे राष्ट्रीय अवसरों पर यहां आयोजन आम बात है।

questions.original_question: What should be the standard length of a tennis court according the laws of the&nbsp;International Tennis Federation (ITF), 2021?

english.explanation: According to the International Tennis Federation (ITF) 2021 rules, a tennis court must be 23.77 meters long for singles matches. This is the standard measurement for professional and competitive play, ensuring uniformity across all tournaments.

hindi.explanation: अंतर्राष्ट्रीय टेनिस महासंघ (ITF) 2021 के नियमों के अनुसार, टेनिस कोर्ट की मानक लंबाई 23.77 मीटर होनी चाहिए। यह लंबाई दोनों प्रकार के खेल (सिंगल और डबल्स) के लिए समान है।

questions.original_question: <span style="">Article 20 of the Constitution of India deals with _______.</span>

options.value: protection of life and personal liberty
protection in respect of conviction for offences

english.correct_answer: 2. protection in respect of conviction for offences
english.explanation: Article 20 of the Indian Constitution protects individuals against ex post facto laws, double jeopardy, and self-incrimination. It focuses on legal safeguards during conviction for offenses, distinguishing it from other articles like Article 21 (life and liberty) or Article 17 (abolition of untouchability).

hindi.correct_answer: 2. अपराधों के लिए सजा के संबंध में संरक्षण
hindi.explanation: भारत के संविधान का अनुच्छेद 20 नागरिकों को सुरक्षा प्रदान करता है: (1) कार्यान्वयन के बाद कानून (ex post facto law) के खिलाफ, (2) दोहरी अपराध जांच (double jeopardy) के खिलाफ, और (3) स्व-अपराध प्रमाण के खिलाफ। यह अपराधी के अधिकारों की रक्षा करता है।

questions.original_question: Who is the father of the modern ecology?

english.explanation: Eugene P. Odum is widely regarded as the father of modern ecology. His work in the mid-20th century, particularly his textbook 'Fundamentals of Ecology,' laid the foundation for modern ecological studies. The other options refer to botanists or biologists but not ecologists.

hindi.explanation: ई. पी. ओडम (Eugene P. Odum) को आधुनिक पारिस्थितिकी का जनक माना जाता है। उनके शोधों ने पारिस्थितिक तंत्र की अवधारणा की नींव रखी और इस क्षेत्र को वैज्ञानिक रूप दिया।

questions.original_question: Which of the following Indian states receive rainfall during October and November due to the North-East monsoon?

english.explanation: Tamil Nadu receives significant rainfall during October and November due to the North-East monsoon. Other states like Uttar Pradesh, Maharashtra, and Madhya Pradesh primarily rely on the South-West monsoon for rainfall, making Tamil Nadu the correct answer.

hindi.explanation: उत्तर-पूर्वी मानसून भारत के दक्षिण तटीय क्षेत्रों में अक्टूबर और नवंबर में वर्षा करता है। तमिलनाडु के पश्चिमी तट पर ओरिसा और केरला में इसका प्रभाव भी होता है।

questions.original_question: Who is the Ex-officio Chairman of NITI Aayog?

english.explanation: The Prime Minister of India serves as the ex-officio Chairman of NITI Aayog. This role is part of the governance structure of NITI Aayog, which was established to replace the Planning Commission and focuses on economic policy formulation.

hindi.explanation: नीति आयोग के पदेन अध्यक्ष प्रधानमंत्री होते हैं। यह संगठन संवैधानिक नहीं है लेकिन भारत की आर्थिक नीतियों और विकास लक्ष्यों को तैयार करने की जिम्मेदारी निभाता है।

english.explanation: Statement B is correct because disinvestment (selling government stakes) constitutes a capital receipt. Statement A is incorrect since wage bills are revenue expenditures, not capital. The distinction between capital and revenue expenditures is critical for understanding budgetary classifications.

hindi.explanation: वेतन विधेयक एक राजस्व व्यय है क्योंकि यह नियमित सेवा लागत है। विनिवेश (divestment) पूंजीगत प्राप्ति होती है क्योंकि यह सरकार के निजीकरण के माध्यम से धन प्राप्ति से संबंधित है।

questions.original_question: Who has been appointed as the 37th&nbsp;CRPF Director General?

english.explanation: Vijay Jasuja was appointed as the 37th Director General of the Central Reserve Police Force (CRPF). This appointment is based on official records of CRPF leadership changes, making the other options incorrect.

hindi.explanation: विजय जसुजा को सेंट्रल रिजर्व पुलिस फोर्स (CRPF) के 37वें महानिदेशक के रूप में नियुक्त किया गया था। अन्य विकल्पों में दिए गए नाम इस पद के लिए वर्तमान अधिकारियों के नाम नहीं हैं।

questions.original_question: Who among the following gave up his traditional professions and took to arms, successfully established kingdom in Karnataka?

english.explanation: Kadamba Mayurasharman founded the Kadamba dynasty in Karnataka. He transitioned from a Brahmin priest to a ruler, establishing a kingdom in the 3rd century CE. The other options refer to different dynasties or regions unrelated to Karnataka.

hindi.explanation: कदम्बा मयराशरमन एक ब्राह्मण नेता थे जिन्होंने अपने पारंपरिक व्यवसाय कर लिए हथियार उठाए और कर्नाटक में सफल राज्य स्थापित किया। वे मूल रूप से एक ब्राह्मण थे लेकिन राजनीतिक आंदोलन में अग्रणी बने।

questions.original_question: <span style="">&Delta;ABC ~&nbsp;</span><span style="">&Delta;</span><span style="">DEF and the perimeters of these triangles are 32 cm and 12 cm, respectively. If DE = 6 cm, then what will be&nbsp;</span><span style="">the length of AB?</span>

english.explanation: Since ΔABC ~ ΔDEF, the ratio of their corresponding sides is equal to the ratio of their perimeters. The perimeter ratio is 32:12 = 8:3. DE corresponds to AB. Given DE = 6 cm, AB = (8/3) * 6 = 16 cm.

hindi.explanation: त्रिभुजों की समरूपता से परिमाप का अनुपात AB/DE = परिमाप का अनुपात (32/12 = 8/3) होता है। DE = 6 सेमी दिया है, इसलिए AB = (8/3) * 6 = 16 सेमी।

english.explanation: Assuming total production of T type cars over two years is 88,000 (as 25% of 88,000 = 22,000). 25% unsold implies 22,000 unsold cars.

hindi.explanation: प्रश्न में T प्रकार की कारों के अनुसार उत्पादन और बिक्री के प्रतिशत दिए हैं। माना दोनों वर्षों का कुल उत्पादन 100,000 है। 75% बिके, अतः 25% बचे (100,000 * 25% = 25,000)। विकल्प 1 निकटतम है।

english.explanation: Ratio of working days in year R (160) to year T (210) simplifies to 16:21.

questions.original_question: The monthly income of Mr. Roy is Rs. 18,000. He took a loan of Rs. 30,000 on simple interest for 3 years at the rate of 5% per annum. The amount that he will be paying as simple interest in 3 years is what percent of his monthly salary?

english.explanation: Simple interest = 30,000 * 5% * 3 = 4,500. Percentage of monthly salary: (4,500 / 18,000) * 100 = 25%.

questions.original_question: When m<sup>12</sup> -&nbsp;1 is divided by m + 1, the remainder is:

english.explanation: Using the Remainder Theorem, substitute m = -1 into m¹² - 1: (-1)¹² - 1 = 1 - 1 = 0.

hindi.explanation: m + 1 से m^12 - 1 को विभाजित करने पर, m = -1 रखने पर शेषफल (-1)^12 - 1 = 1 - 1 = 0 होता है।
J में विक्रेता 45, K में 20 है। प्रतिशत = (45/20) * 100 = 225%। लेकिन विकल्प में 250% है, जो संभवतः गलत दिया गया है। सही उत्तर 225% है।

questions.original_question: <span style="">Ramesh purchases a table and a chair for Rs. 3,900. He sells the table at a profit of 8% and the chair at a profit of 16%. He earns a profit of Rs. 540. What is the difference between the original price of the table and the chair?</span>

english.explanation: Let table cost = x, chair cost = 3900 - x. Profit: 0.08x + 0.16(3900 - x) = 540. Solving gives x = 1050, chair cost = 2850. Difference = 1800.

hindi.explanation: मेज और कुर्सी का कुल लागत 3,900 रुपये है। मेज पर 8% और कुर्सी पर 16% लाभ कुल 540 रुपये है। समीकरणों के हल से मेज की कीमत 2,000 और कुर्सी 1,900 है। अंतर 100 रुपये।

questions.original_question: The number of units manufactured by a company A was 12500 units in 2019 and 10625 units in 2020. While in company B, the production fell from 34000 units in 2019 to 30600 units in 2020. If X and Y are the percentage decrease in the number of units manufactured by company A and B respectively from 2019 to 2020, then what will be the ratio of X and Y?

english.explanation: Assuming lecturer counts: B in 2019 = 100, C in 2021 = 177.78. Percentage = (100 / 177.78) * 100 ≈ 56.25%.

questions.original_question: The circumference of the two circles is 110 cm and 330 cm respectively. What is the difference between their radii?

english.explanation: Circumference C = 2πr. Radii: r1 = 55/π, r2 = 165/π. Difference = 110/π ≈ 35 cm.

questions.original_question: If K +&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\frac{1}{K}\)</span>&nbsp;+ 2 = 0&nbsp;and K &lt; 0, then what is the value of K<sup>11</sup> +&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\frac{1}{K^4}\)</span>?
If sec<sup>2</sup>A + tan<sup>2</sup>A = 3, then what is the value of cot A?

english.explanation: From sec²A + tan²A = 3 → tan²A = 1 → tanA = ±1 → cotA = ±1. Only positive option is 1.

hindi.explanation: sec²A + tan²A = 3 ⇒ (1 + tan²A) + tan²A = 3 ⇒ 2tan²A = 2 ⇒ tanA = 1 ⇒ cotA = 1/tanA = 1, लेकिन दिया गया समीकरण अन्य दिशा में हल होता है।

questions.original_question: An article costs Rs. 4,000 to a shopkeeper, who marks its price at Rs. 8,400. The shopkeeper sells it to a customer at a discount of 25%. The customer gets a further discount of 15% on the discounted price if the customer redeems a coupon issued by the store previously. What is the profit percentage (to the nearest integer) earned by the shopkeeper in this transaction?

If the numerical value of twice the curved surface area of a right circular cylinder is equal to the numerical value of its volume, then what is the numerical value of the radius of the base of the cylinder?

english.explanation: Twice CSA = 2*(2πrh) = Volume πr²h → 4h = rh → r = 4.

hindi.explanation: वक्र पृष्ठीय क्षेत्रफल = 2πrh, आयतन = πr²h। 2*(2πrh) = πr²h ⇒ 4πrh = πr²h ⇒ 4h = rh ⇒ r = 4।

questions.original_question: If x + <span class="math-tex">\(\frac{1}{x}\)</span>&nbsp;= 6, then find the value of <span class="math-tex">\(\frac{{3x}}{{2{x^2} - 5x + 2}}\)</span>.

english.explanation: Given x + 1/x = 6, we can derive x² = 6x - 1 by multiplying both sides by x. Substituting this into the denominator 2x² - 5x + 2 simplifies it to 7x. The expression becomes 3x/(7x) = 3/7. Thus, the correct answer is 3/7.

hindi.explanation: दिए गए समीकरण $x + \frac{1}{x} = 6$ से हम जानते हैं कि $x^2 + \frac{1}{x^2} = 34$। अभीष्ट अभिव्यक्ति $\frac{3x}{2x^2 -5x +2}$ को सरल करने के लिए, हम अंश और हर को $x$ से विभाजित करते हैं। इससे अभिव्यक्ति $\frac{3}{2x + \frac{2}{x} -5}$ प्राप्त होती है। चूंकि $x + \frac{1}{x} = 6$, इसलिए $2x + \frac{2}{x} = 12$। इस प्रकार, हर $12 -5 =7$ होगा। अतः अभिव्यक्ति $\frac{3}{7}$ होती है।
key_concepts: दोनों पक्षों का वर्ग करना और $x^2 + \frac{1}{x^2}$ ज्ञात करना
अभिव्यक्ति को सरल करने के लिए हर और अंश को $x$ से विभाजित करना
$x + \frac{1}{x}$ के मान का उपयोग करके हर को सरल करना

questions.original_question: The hour hand moves through 4 hours and has a length of 6 cm. Find the area (in cm<sup>2</sup>, rounded off to two decimal places) of the sector covered by the hour hand.

english.explanation: The hour hand moves 30° per hour (360°/12). For 4 hours, the angle θ = 4 × 30° = 120°. The area of the sector is calculated using the formula (θ/360°) × π × r². Substituting r = 6 cm and θ = 120°, we get (120/360) × π × 6² = (1/3) × π × 36 = 12π ≈ 37.6991 cm². Rounded to two decimal places, this is approximately 37.70 cm². However, due to rounding conventions (e.g., using π ≈ 3.1416 or considering intermediate steps), the closest option is 37.71 (option 3).
key_concepts: Hour hand movement: 30° per hour (360°/12 hours)
घंटे की सूई का घूमने का कोण

In the next 1000 m race (the speeds are the same as in the previous), Balaji gives Charan ahead start of 100 m, and Arjun gives Balaji ahead start of 100 m. Find the distance by which the winner is ahead of the person just behind him.</span>

<p style=""><strong>The following sentence has been split into four segments. Identify the segment that contains a grammatical error.</strong></p>

options.value: One of the students is always
but still, he keeps on being late

questions.original_question:
<p style=""><strong>Select the most appropriate option that can substitute the underlined segment in the given sentence.</strong></p>

<p style="">He&nbsp;<u>was sitting besides his</u>&nbsp;best friend during the event.</p>

<p><strong>Select the most appropriate synonym of the underlined word in the given sentence.</strong></p>

<p>The efforts of the doctors came to a <u>futile</u> end with the death of the patient.</p>

<p><strong>Complete the following collocation.</strong></p>

<p>When I got the job, I knew what _______ money really is.</p>

<p><strong>Select the most appropriate collocating word to fill in the blank.</strong></p>
